body:
Hello,

Thank you for the answers from last week. They were very helpful.

I installed Radiance for windows. I used the instruction file "A
survival guide to
Radiance on Windows " from the 7th International RADIANCE Workshop in
2008.

Could you recommend any tutorials and manuals to start with Radiance?

I'm not sure, how I will start to introduce myself in Radiance.

Thank you in advance.

Marion Kerl
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] RE: Radiance-general Digest, Vol 79, Issue 17
